comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Food photography in Black & White, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 29734622@N05
comment._content: Notice the clothing:  even men's trousers waistbands were worn at the waist, with belts.  Visible underclothes were not a possibility. (Only the wealthy had more than three sets of underwear?)
